column4: wɔnnsɛɛ wo bi; na ɔkontompɔnyi a wonntwaa wo nkontompɔ bi! Ber a egyaa dɛ esɛɛ no
column5: wɔbɛsɛɛ wo bi; na ber a ama nkontompɔtwa abɔ adze no

column3: yɛ adom ma hɛn; ɔwo na hɛn enyi da wo kwan: ɔwo yɛ hɛn abasa adzekyee nyina
column4: hɛn nkwagye so wɔ ɔfona ber mu."

column2: "Weɔɔweɔɔyɛ ne dede ntsi na aman eguanguan; w'ahomado ntsi na amanaman apetse."
"Na wɔbɔboa hom asadze ano dɛ mbrɛ esa boaboa ano; dɛ mbrɛ mbɛbɛw tutu na wobotutu esi do."
"Wɔakrɔn EWURADZE; osiandɛ ɔtse sor noho: ɔdze atsɛmbu nye tsenenee ahyɛ Zion ma."

column5: na nyimdzee mbordo: EWURADZE ho suro nye n'akoradze."

column3: hɔn akatakyi retsea mu wɔ guado: asomdwee ho ahembɔfo rusu osu wen."
ɔkwantsemfo egyaa mu twa: wɔato ahyɛmu no
ɔfɔn: Lebanon enyi ato na oetwintwam koraa: Saron ayɛ dɛ sar pradada; na Bashan na Karmel popo hɔn haban."
EWURADZE na ɔse; afei na mebɛma moho do; afei na wobohuhor me."
na hom awo mburonan: hom ahom yɛ ogya a ɔbɛhyew hom."

column2: "Na aman bɛyɛ dɛ kaadow nhyewee: dɛ nsoɛ a woetwa a wɔhyew wɔ ogya mu."

column3: hom ntsie dza mayɛ; na hom a hom bɛn
column4: hom ngye mo tum nto mu."

column2: "Zion mu ndzebɔnyɛfo akoma etutu; ahohim afa hɔn a wonnyi Nyankopɔn mprase. Hɛn mu woana na ɔnye ogya a ɔhyew bɛtsena? Hɛn mu woana na ɔnye daa nhyewee no bɛtsena?"

column3: na ɔkasa tɔɔtsen mu; nyia okyir apempensi ho mfaso
column4: ɔpopo ne nsa ho wɔ mboabadzi ne ka ho
column5: osisiw n'aso wɔ abɔgyasɛm ne tsie ho
column6: na omuamua n'enyi wɔ bɔn no hwɛ ho."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔbɛtsena ɔsorsor: no twitwagyebea bɛyɛ abotan aban: obenya n'edziban; no nsu nnkɔbɔ no."
"W'enyiwa bohu ɔhen no wɔ n'ahoɔfɛw mu: wɔbɔhwɛ asaase a ɔtrɛ kɔ ekyirekyir."
"W'akoma bɔdwendwen ehudze no ho: nyia ɔkan no wɔ hen
column3: nyia oker ntoboa no wɔ hen? Nyia ɔkaan abantsentsen no wɔ hen?"
ɔman a hɔn kasaa mu dɔ a innkotum ehu mu no; apɔtɔfo a innkotum atse hɔn ase no."
hɛn afahyɛ kurow no: w'enyiwa bohu Jerusalɛm
column6: wɔronnhohɔr no mbɔfodua no ara pɛn
column7: no ho ahoma so mu biara renntsetsew."

column2: "Na hɔ na EWURADZE nye hɛn bɛtsena tumdzi mu
column3: esutsen atɛtɛr na nwora bea; hɔ na ntabon ahɛn biara nnkɔkɔ
column4: na ahɛn akɛse so nnkotwa mu wɔ hɔ."
EWURADZE nye hɛn hen; ɔbɛgye hɛn nkwa."

column2: "Wo ntampehoma mu agogow; woenntum ennsusuo hɛndua no ase dzen
column3: woenntum anntserɛw abradaa no mu: ɔno na wɔbɛkyekyɛɛ asadze kɛse a wɔfae no mu; mpakye mpo na bɛfa afomdze."

column2: "Na ɔmamfo no mu bi nnkɛse dɛ
column3: Meyar: na wɔdze ɔman a wɔtse mu no hɔn emumuyɛ bɛkyɛ hɔn."
